products.title: Marble, Shimmer - Roller Blind
products.description: The intricate texture of marble shimmer invites your eye in to take a closer look at a fabric that is certainly more than it first appears. As you survey the changes in direction of the pattern you quickly lose yourself in the moment and feel at ease. If you want to project the theme around the room then you need to think about other natural patterns you can work in. The undulating texture of slate, the rings on a log slice, and the way in which the light dances with sprung copper would all be interesting things to look at.

products.title: Capri (Blackout), Chiffon - Roller Blind
products.description: The capri (blackout)'s chiffon offers a light and airy feel, whilst simultaneously keeping out bright daytime sunlight and overpowering night-time street and car lights. And when it's also durable, wipe-clean, and long-lasting, what more could you need?Use the chiffon in the kitchen, with beige neutrals and dark woods; silver fittings will bring out the pretty silver patterning. Otherwise, use in a contemporary dining room, with a dark dining table and neutral walls to create a relaxing, luxurious environment for entertaining guests.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Gossip - Roller Blind
products.description: Get some gossip with this apple green offering from the sarra (blackout) range. This is a fresh, vibrant hue that adds a spot of fun to any room, while at the same time offering functionality in its excellent blackout properties. This shade of green will make white walls look even more crisp and clean, and can be accented with matching accessories throughout the room, such as sofa cushions or ornaments in the living room, or towels and soaps in the bathroom.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Rocket - Roller Blind
products.description: The sarra (blackout) rocket is a brave and daring shade that will shade out the outside light while adding a focal point for your room. The grainy texture and sleek, quality fabric causes an almost shiny appearance as the light bounces off it, making it even more eye-catching. This deep red hue will add a pop of colour to an otherwise monochrome living room, making for a great room for relaxing in.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cerulean - Roller Blind
products.description: A cool but dusky shade of blue, the palermo (blackout) in cerulean is a unique hue all of its own. The smooth, high quality fabric used is wipe-clean and gives a truly superior finish, as well as having excellent blackout properties. Use in a kitchen amongst contemporary patterning and classic shades of grey and taupe, or make a feature of the hallway window. Alternatively, this blind will look particularly stylish in a bathroom window, amidst white and silver fittings and light woods.

products.title: Marble, Aulait - Roller Blind
products.description: A creamy rich fabric that introduces the characteristic patterning found on marble. This is a fabric unlike any other, and one that is waiting to be explored so that you can really get to know everything it has to offer. As it moves gently in the breeze you'll be in no doubt that you made the right choice. Matching to marble aulait is a matter of taste, but that's not to say there aren't some tried and tested colour combinations you might want to start with.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Crimson - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout)'s crimson is a blackout blind not to be missed - and by that, we mean it can't be missed. This eye-catching blind makes for a stylish window feature, with the added benefits of being high quality, simple to use, and long-lasting. Create a bold look in the bathroom by choosing the crimson as the central feature, and complementing it with white walls and silver fittings. Or instead, use amongst an otherwise monochrome colour scheme in a contemporary kitchen or dining area.

products.title: Marble, Raven - Roller Blind
products.description: Raven black is a shade that stands on its own right at the far end of the colour spectrum. When you see it combined with the textured patterning that their marble collection is know for the result is really quite something. It seems to come alive as the light works its way around your room. Ideal if you want to breathe new life into your favourite place to be. The regal look and feel of the fabric makes it the ideal addition to the modern fitted dining room.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Zest - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) zest is pure freshness, with this eye-catching lime shade offering all of the brightness with none of the disturbing outside rays. The simply rolling mechanism and the firm blackout fabric make this the ideal functional window covering. Use in a contemporary open living and dining area, paired with white walls and light woods, and complemented by fruity orange accessories. You'll love spending time in such a cheery room and it will certainly be a talking point with guests.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Burgundy - Roller Blind
products.description: Palermo (blackout)'s burgundy combines the classic dark reddish brown shade with high quality functionality and ease of use. A robust blackout blind, it is created from a sleek, fuss-free fabric using the latest blackout technology. The burgundy can sit as a beautiful window feature against cream walls and dark woods, making for a very classic yet contemporary bathroom or kitchen. Or use it with simple creams and gold accessories in an adult's bedroom for sophistication, elegance, and style, all in one.

products.title: Nile Walnut Real Wood
products.description: The nile range of wood blinds is available in several distinctive forest colours and also available in different slat widths so will suit any window in your home. This dark wood blind will look great in rooms with a warm colour scheme or as a contrast to lighter coloured walls. At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. With over fifty years experience in manufacturing and selling blinds in the uk, their wooden blinds are made by their expert team, and packed and shipped to your doorstep.

This medium wood blind is the perfect choice for any room in your home due to its classic look. At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. products.description: The nile range of wood blinds is available in several distinctive forest colours and also available in different stat widths so will suit any window in your home. products.title: Nile White Real Wood
products.description: The nile range of wood blinds is available in several distinctive forest colours and also available in different slat widths so will suit any window in your home. This classic white wood blind will look great in any room in your home as it will create a fresh, crisp and light feel. At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. With over fifty years experience in manufacturing and selling blinds in the uk, their wooden blinds are made by their expert team, and packed and shipped to your doorstep.

products.title: Tiffany, Flawless - Roller Blind
products.description: The tiffany flawless is an elegant and refined blind. A light, breezy fabric layered with a natural contoured pattern, the flawless looks simply stunning as it delicately shimmers in the light. Use the timeless off-white of the flawless to accentuate darker neutrals in a home office or dining room, or pair with pretty peaches and medium woods to add a touch of sophistication and class to an open kitchen diner.

products.title: Tiffany, Smoulder - Roller Blind
products.description: A blind offering a light and classy fabric, the tiffany smoulder is a modern take on the colour charcoal, with three gently contrasting tones and a beautiful pattern. The combination of natural-shaped patterning and the fine texture of the cloth allows this blind to flow effortlessly when lowered. The subtle variations in tone on this blind make the smoulder well-suited to both darker themed rooms, like traditional country cottage kitchens with dark wood features, and light and airy living rooms and dining rooms.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Pewter - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma (fr) collection is both an attractive and practical range of quality blinds, with flame-retardant fabric and a modern roller mechanism. Feature the pewter in either a domestic or commercial surrounding for a contemporary look with beneficial practical properties. Combine the pewter with a modern and distinctive monochrome scheme to form a contemporary look full of current and characteristic style.

products.title: Tiffany, Chrome - Roller Blind
products.description: An on-trend portfolio of natural greys and a free-flowing pattern combine harmoniously to create tiffany chrome. The way in which the threads shimmer under the light gives it the name, and the way in which it refines any contemporary space gives it the reputation. Match with deep sandy browns and hints of natural green for a simple triple colour offering that instantly makes you feel at home. For an added touch of inspiration you could add some simple minimalist wall art to the home office so that you can get truly creative when the time comes.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Beige - Roller Blind
products.description: Compose a sophisticated look with the roma (fr) in beige, where a soft and subtle fabric forms an elegant blind with a modern and practical edge. With flame-retardant, crease-free fabric, mounted on a simple rolling mechanism, this graceful blind brings soothing colour and understated style. Frame the beige with plush fabrics in complementing mocha or chocolate tones to form a window display that's full of contrast and alluring colour.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: Feature the cool and contemporary roma (fr) in grey within any surrounding for a modern looking blind with graceful finesse. This lenient and flame-retardant cloth forms an easy-to-use roller-blind with a simple pull-cord mechanism and in a charming, dove grey finish. Combine the grey with a distinctive and compelling palette of white, charcoal, and black shades to form a monochrome-influenced scheme that's full of alluring colour contrasts.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Light Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma (fr) collection features flame-retardant fabrics, which makes them perfect for either the family home or commercial site. The light grey edition is sure to blend within any dcor style for a contemporary look with subtle shade. Form an attractive and delicate palette, with an industrial edge, by incorporating the light grey with a soft blend of pastels in vintage pinks and creams. Accent the blind by adding subdued grey fabrics within the rest of the room, adding character and charm with dainty florals and paisley prints.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Crimson - Roller Blind
products.description: Showcase the brilliant and bright roma (fr) in crimson within a playful room to include stimulating colour and modern style. The contemporary roller mechanism and striking dye produces an eye-catching look in a dazzling and distinctive red shade. Complement the crimson with a fun and friendly collection of primary colours, forming a welcoming and plentiful colour scheme for a playroom. Encourage an imaginative and creative feel by blending blocks of contrasting colour with a stark white background for vivid bursts of colour.

products.title: Tiffany, Imagine - Roller Blind
products.description: Dare to imagine the ideal blend of natural beige, soothing creams, and a naturally flowing raised patterning, and you have the tiffany imagine, the calming influence you have been looking for. The imagine will work wonderfully amongst contrasting dark woods in a neutral living or sitting room, or in a luxurious bedroom full of browns, creams, and golds. Or place in a guest bedroom or hallway where the distinctive tiffany patterning can add a touch of neutral style with little effort.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Azure - Roller Blind
products.description: For an eye-catching window display, feature the vivid roma (fr) in azure. Made from sturdy, flame-retardant material, perfect for commercial use, this is a modern blind with a simple rolling mechanism for easy functionality. Blend the vibrant azure with bursts of lime green, dove grey, and duck egg blue to form a current palette of summer brights. Stick to a soothing white or ivory base for a clean and contemporary look, adding heaps of character and contrast by intertwining the selected tones with botanic prints and compelling textures.

products.title: Deanna, Mist - Roller Blind
products.description: The deanna mist is a very modern take on a standard white blind. With a gentle hint of silver and the two-tone effect created by the raised deanna patterning, this blind offers a pretty and classy shimmer. The mist is the perfect addition to any contemporary room and will contrast well with crisp, clean colours and tones, setting off against rich greys particularly well. Use in a bedroom for a bright and airy feel, or in a bathroom to keep the atmosphere fresh and clean.

products.title: Deanna, Soft Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: If you're looking for a gentle, off-white cream to provide a calming, discreet background colour, but want a little bit of character to go with it, then the softly patterned deanna in soft cream is the blind for you. Ideal for a hallway in which you want to control the light without darkening the room or clashing with your existing interior dcor, this blind will work well against browns and other neutrals.

products.title: Tiffany, Dove - Roller Blind
products.description: A clever and enchanting blend of different tones of cream, the tiffany dove is a light, classy blind whose patterning provides a distinctive and eye-catching feature for any window in your home. Place in the bedroom to provide a light and airy feel, and a natural colour against other dcor, or perhaps add to the bathroom, where the dove will offer balance and airiness when set against bolder colours that need toning down.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Chambray - Roller Blind
products.description: The rich, dark blue of the origin (blackout) in chambray is one of elegance and royalty, and can induce a moody or a regal feel depending on what it's paired with. Its sleek, cutting edge finish makes it a pleasure to use and means it will stand the test of time, just like its colour. Use in the bedroom alongside dark woods and gold trims for a regal, stately look, or pair with light and dark greys and off-whites in the dining room or home office for a contemporary but moody feel.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Illusion - Roller Blind
products.description: Pretty in rosy pink, the origin (blackout)'s illusion is an attractive and appealing shade, combining all of the benefits of a blackout blind with a contemporary, pretty look. It's deceptively sturdy, enough so that it can handle plenty of day-to-day use. Nestle the illusion amongst whites, creams, and paler pinks to create a candy-coloured dream bedroom. Or go for something a little different by placing it in a bathroom; after all, who says bathrooms have to be aqua? We certainly don't.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Riptide - Roller Blind
products.description: Is it blue or is it grey? Or perhaps it has a hint of mint green in it? The chameleon-like origin (blackout) riptide will get your guests talking, and whilst it's doing that will still be offering a sleek, robust window covering that blocks light easily. Nestle the riptide amongst aqua blues and turquoises to bring out the fresh iciness of this blind. It's the perfect hue for a green or blue bathroom, or would work well as a subtle accent colour in a light and airy white bedroom or hallway.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Crimson - Roller Blind
products.description: Shield against the night-time light and bright, summertime sun with the origin (blackout) in crimson, a quality blackout blind that fits perfectly in any window size. This plush red shade is sure to brighten your home, whilst simultaneously adding a modern edge with its simple rolling mechanism. Form a romantic and attractive dcor by featuring the crimson amongst an assortment of dainty florals and delicate details.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Sky - Roller Blind
products.description: The vivid blue of the origin (blackout)'s sky is a sight to behold, being even more sky-blue than anything outside can offer. This bright tone will bring the outside in, even when it's blacking out the sun from outside. For a bold, playful look in a playroom or child's bedroom, match the sky with a colourful wallpaper full of greens, yellows, and oranges. Alternatively, add to a white or cream home office for a striking look and a clean, contemporary feel.

products.title: Amor Lunar Vertical Blind
products.description: The darker grey colour of the amor lunar is moody and mysterious, but yet has a charm about it that makes you want to install it in your window. This fabric is fully blackout so will prevent all of the light from passing through it making it ideal for bedrooms. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Amor Ironmonger Vertical Blind
products.description: The soft grey colour of the amor ironmonger is ideal for anyone looking for a stylish and modern colour in their window. Pair this in with whites and dark greys in the rest of your home to create a relaxing environment to enjoy and relax within. These blinds are a blackout material so will stop all of the light from passing through the material, making these ideal for bedrooms. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Amor Atoll Vertical Blind
products.description: Use the amor atoll blackout roller blind to add a bright blue splash of colour into your hoem and over your windows. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Amor Campfire Smoke Vertical Blind
products.description: The slightly darker grey colour of the amor campfire smoke is ideal for anyone looking for a stylish and modern, darker grey colour in their window. Pair this in with whites and soft greys in the rest of your home to create a relaxing environment to enjoy and relax within. These blinds are a blackout material so will block all of the light from passing through, making this a perfect blind for your bedroom.
